llm.feedback: The draft lacks explicit canonical‑handle mapping, precise magnitude ranges, and clear catalyst windows; revise each line to include the handle (e.g., spx, ndx), the expected bp or % move, the exact date or period (e.g., July 2025 Q3 earnings, 2025‑08‑29 verdict), and attach the relevant ID (KNWKYIQ1W, LJZYDXVL3, H86O3XRUJ). For CrowdStrike, state “CrowdStrike Q3 earnings surprise (KNWKYIQ1W) – July 2025 – lift spx 2–3 bp, ndx 5–10 bp – watch earnings release – 60 %”. For the Fed shift, specify “Fed Q4 2025 policy shift (KNWKYIQ1W) – lift spx 1–2 bp, ndx 3–5 bp – watch Fed minutes – 55 %”. For Tesla, map to spx only, quantify “Tesla verdict 2025‑08‑29 (LJZYDXVL3) – depress spx 3–5 bp – watch court ruling – 45 %”. For EPAM, include the upside lift to spx 0.1–0.2 % (H86O3XRUJ) and the risk of a miss; add the Q2 earnings date 2025‑05‑15 and probability 35 %. Ensure each line is a single sentence, no filler, and that every claim is backed by an ID.
